summary: A test suite that validates the core functionality of an image super‑resolution pipeline by supplying mock components and inputs, then checking key behaviors such as attention slicing, batch inference consistency, model serialization in various precisions and configurations, and optional xformers‑based attention support.
business_intent: Provide rapid, automated verification of the super‑resolution pipeline to guarantee stability and correctness during development and CI, reducing regression risk for AI‑driven image enhancement products.
